text: Study the ancient runes carefully and try to decipher their meaning
Reach out and touch the pulsing magical energy
Attempt to pick the simple lock mechanism
Use brute force to break open the cache
Cup the glowing water in your hands and drink
Carefully collect some of the mystical water in a bottle
Kneel before the shrine and offer a prayer
Investigate the shrine's construction and symbols
Try to carefully extract one of the magical crystals
Place your hands on the crystals and focus your energy
